bcbioRNASeq 0.2.6

Alpha Level Cutoff Summary Statistics

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/alphaSummary-methods.R
alphaSummary.Rd

Quickly generate a summary table of various alpha level cutoffs, for use in an R Markdown report.

alphaSummary(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqDataSet
alphaSummary(object, alpha = c(0.1, 0.05, 0.01,
  0.001, 1e-06), caption = NULL, ...)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Passthrough arguments to DESeq2::results(). Use either contrast or name arguments to define the desired contrast.
alpha

numeric. Multiple alpha cutoffs.
caption

string or NULL. Table caption. If set NULL, will be generated automatically from the contrast used.

Value

kable.

Note

bcbioRNASeq class does currently support contrast definitions, since the object contains an internal DESeqDataSet with an empty design formula.

See also

DESeq2::results().

Other Differential Expression Functions: contrastName, plotDEGHeatmap, plotDEGPCA, plotMeanAverage, plotVolcano, resultsTables

Examples

# DESeqDataSet ====
design(dds_small)
#> ~treatment
resultsNames(dds_small)
#> [1] "Intercept"                       "treatment_folic_acid_vs_control"
alphaSummary(dds_small, contrast = c("treatment", "folic_acid", "control"))
#> 
#> 
#> |               |0.1                           |0.05                          |0.01                          |0.001                         |1e-06                         |
#> |:--------------|:-----------------------------|:-----------------------------|:-----------------------------|:-----------------------------|:-----------------------------|
#> |LFC > 0 (up)   |LFC > 0 (up)       : 115, 23% |LFC > 0 (up)       : 88, 18%  |LFC > 0 (up)       : 58, 12%  |LFC > 0 (up)       : 31, 6.2% |LFC > 0 (up)       : 19, 3.8% |
#> |LFC < 0 (down) |LFC < 0 (down)     : 139, 28% |LFC < 0 (down)     : 120, 24% |LFC < 0 (down)     : 100, 20% |LFC < 0 (down)     : 59, 12%  |LFC < 0 (down)     : 14, 2.8% |
#> |outliers       |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |
#> |low counts     |low counts [2]     : 0, 0%    |low counts [2]     : 0, 0%    |low counts [2]     : 0, 0%    |low counts [2]     : 0, 0%    |low counts [2]     : 39, 7.8% |
#> |cutoff         |(mean count < 33)             |(mean count < 33)             |(mean count < 33)             |(mean count < 33)             |(mean count < 61)             |
alphaSummary(dds_small, name = "treatment_folic_acid_vs_control")
#> 
#> 
#> |               |0.1                           |0.05                          |0.01                          |0.001                         |1e-06                         |
#> |:--------------|:-----------------------------|:-----------------------------|:-----------------------------|:-----------------------------|:-----------------------------|
#> |LFC > 0 (up)   |LFC > 0 (up)       : 115, 23% |LFC > 0 (up)       : 88, 18%  |LFC > 0 (up)       : 58, 12%  |LFC > 0 (up)       : 31, 6.2% |LFC > 0 (up)       : 19, 3.8% |
#> |LFC < 0 (down) |LFC < 0 (down)     : 139, 28% |LFC < 0 (down)     : 120, 24% |LFC < 0 (down)     : 100, 20% |LFC < 0 (down)     : 59, 12%  |LFC < 0 (down)     : 14, 2.8% |
#> |outliers       |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |outliers [1]       : 6, 1.2%  |
#> |low counts     |low counts [2]     : 0, 0%    |low counts [2]     : 0, 0%    |low counts [2]     : 0, 0%    |low counts [2]     : 0, 0%    |low counts [2]     : 39, 7.8% |
#> |cutoff         |(mean count < 33)             |(mean count < 33)             |(mean count < 33)             |(mean count < 33)             |(mean count < 61)             |
